references.paper_title: Scannet: Richly-annotated 3d reconstructions of indoor scenes
references.reason: This paper introduces a large-scale dataset, ScanNet, crucial for training and evaluating 3D scene reconstruction models, including the one presented in this paper.

references.paper_title: SUN RGB-D: A RGB-D scene understanding benchmark suite
references.reason: This paper introduces another important dataset, SUN RGB-D, used for benchmarking 3D scene understanding methods, providing a valuable resource for evaluating the proposed model's performance.

references.paper_title: Total3dunderstanding: Joint layout, object pose and mesh reconstruction for indoor scenes from a single image
references.reason: This paper presents a strong baseline method (Total3D) for holistic scene understanding from a single image, providing a benchmark against which the novel approach is compared.

references.paper_title: Holistic 3d scene parsing and reconstruction from a single rgb image
references.reason: This work proposes a holistic approach to scene understanding, making it relevant as a comparison method and highlighting the challenges that the proposed model aims to address.
This foundational paper introduces denoising diffusion probabilistic models, providing the theoretical framework underlying the novel 3D scene diffusion method proposed in this paper.
